word_mean: 氦：一种无色、无臭及无味的惰性气体，不自燃也不助燃。最初自太阳中测出，后从天然气体中获得。化学符号He，原子序2，原子量4.003。医学上〔USP〕用作气体的稀释物，例如在治疗某些呼吸障碍时用以稀释氧。也用作全身麻醉药的稀释剂
氦氖激光器，helium-neon laser, He-Ne laser 以氖为工作物质、氦为辅助气体的激光器

sentence.Network_cn: 与氦 - 4不同之处是, 氦-3不能由放射性衰变产生.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek hēlios 'sun', because its existence was inferred from an emission line in the sun's spectrum

entry.def: Helium is a very light gas that is colourless and has no smell.

means.word_mean: 1. a very light colorless element that is one of the six inert gasses; the most difficult gas to liquefy; occurs in economically extractable amounts in certain natural gases (as those found in Texas and Kansas)
